mapper.select:
select * from repository_order_detail r left join ( select g.id as g_id, g.name, g.company_id, g.category_id, g.full_name, g.origin, g.jx, g.spec, g.serial, g.code, g.factory_id, g.unit, g.pack_unit, g.medium_pack, g.big_pack, g.pinyin, g.storage_condition, g.storage_description, g.permit_id, g.jx_id, g.is_foreign, g.is_tcm, g.is_prescription, g.special_managed, c.name as categoryName, f.name as factory, u1.name as unitName, u2.name as packUnitName from goods g left join good_category c on g.category_id = c.id left join factory f on g.factory_id = f.id left join unit u1 on g.unit = u1.id left join unit u2 on g.unit = u2.id ) t on r.goods_id = t.g_id where r.repository_order_id in
#{item}
